name: Guardian Pharmacy - St Jacobs (Martin's)
comment:
General pharmacy
  • treatment and prescription of medications for common medical ailments, including rashes, pink eye, insect bites, acne, and urinary tract infections
  • prescription of COVID-19 antiviral treatment (Paxlovid)
  • medication placed in blister packs (sealed, push-through packaging used to separate doses
  • free delivery for prescriptions
  • free in-store blood pressure kiosk
  • ostomy and diabetic supplies

MedsCheck - Appointments to review complex prescriptions with a pharmacist

MedsCheck at Home - Appointments in the patient's home to review complex prescriptions with a pharmacist
serviceProvisionCode: Dispensing fee plus medication costs * prescribed medications may be covered by OHIP

description_of_this:
General pharmacy
  • treatment and prescription of medications for common medical ailments, including rashes, pink eye, insect bites, acne, and urinary tract infections
  • prescription of COVID-19 antiviral treatment (Paxlovid)
  • medication placed in blister packs (sealed, push-through packaging used to separate doses
  • free delivery for prescriptions
  • free in-store blood pressure kiosk
  • ostomy and diabetic supplies

MedsCheck - Appointments to review complex prescriptions with a pharmacist

MedsCheck at Home - Appointments in the patient's home to review complex prescriptions with a pharmacist, Codes: Dispensing fee plus medication costs * prescribed medications may be covered by OHIP, Features: Wheelchair Accessible, Languages: English, Address: Woolwich Community Health Centre, 10 Parkside Dr, St Jacobs, ON, N0B 2N0, Location: lat: 43.5442, lon: -80.5509, Contact: phone: 519-664-3785, fax: 519-664-2170, url: www.martinspharmacy.ca/
